project_tech_stack.text: PHP, SASS, JavaScript & jQuery, SlickJS, Grunt, Gulp

project_main_text.text: Tango League is an adidas lead football league for 16-25 year olds across over 20 countries worldwide, launched in Jan 2017. The website is a platform for the players and captains to join/create teams, apply for events, track their progress, view the leaderboards, and see the amazing prizes on offer.
